frontmatter.title: Writing a UserDefaults editor with SwiftUI and property wrappers
frontmatter.staticPreview: I've been talking a lot online about how useful SwiftUI has been in building debug components for Fluency - debug menus are one of the places where you can start using SwiftUI right now...
frontmatter.mdxPreview: I've been talking a lot online about how useful SwiftUI has been in building debug components for [Fluency](https://getfluency.io?utm_source=noahgilmore.com&utm_campaign=userdefaultseditor&utm_content=0) - debug menus are one of the places where you can start using SwiftUI right now..
